document_title: Carotid artery stenosis: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
The most common cause of carotid artery stenosis is atherosclerotic plaque on the artery wall. In addition, some other risk factors can cause the disease such as:
Blood fat metabolism disorders; High blood pressure; Diabetes; Smoke; Family members with carotid or coronary artery disease; Fat; Sedentary
